head: 1.Create templates for maps or symbols
lab2: Add number to the file name
inf:
Important!
Save the cropped map in
inf1: Map templates stored in /data/templates/maps/ serve as reference cutouts. They are used to recognize and match maps across all scanned pages of the book, enabling automatic map extraction.
inf2: Symbol templates (stored in /data/templates/symbols) serve as references for matching legend symbols in the extracted maps. These templates allow the system to detect and classify different point types consistently.
